transcription: This is our first time participating in Gulf Glass and it turned out to be very good. We got a lot of interesting leads. It happens once every two years. We're thinking about maybe participating in the next Gulf Glass as well. This idea here is to encourage recycling and make sure that no glass goes to the landfill anymore because glass is very bad for the environment. It takes millions of years before it can decompose. The demographics are amazing, what I can say, because I've met a lot of people from different parts of the Middle East.  India, you have Egypt, you have Iran, so many. Goal Class is a platform where people from different industries in the construction, designers, specifiers, even as consultants and contractors, to gather and to look for new technologies and innovations, which is very important when applying to their designs. It's about creating new products. It's also sustainable.  you
